name: Limbo Squared
description:
A short game made for Ludum Dare 44.

You play as a man who throws his limbs around to please a red square.

Every limb you drop allows you to jump once.

Controls:

KB/M (XBOX 360 Controller):

WASD (Left Stick) - Movement

Mouse (Right Stick) - Rotate camera

Q  (X)- Drop arms

E (B) - Drop legs

R (Y) - Throw head

Space (A) - Jump
